name: Dead End (itch)
description:
"There are better twin stick shooters... but few of them feel as unique as Dead End does." -148Apps

You must control the fear of Harold, an unlucky gardener facing the zombie apocalypse.

With only 1 or 2 keys, you decide whether he's running or fighting. You must conquer the simple controls to survive the zombies hoping to snack on his tasty brains.

(Left + Right arrow keys OR Spacebar are the default controls, but they are configurable. I'm calling it one-button because it was designed to only be played with spacebar. I added left and right as a request.)
